Rodimus:

While Rodimus looked to MEgatron, Fortune teller and the others bots 
there he said "Then we have to start a plan... and we don't have to 
fail"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:

> of success."
